title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt, selecting Close All Saved from the file menu does not close all the saved files.
EB: After selecting Close All Saved from the file menu, all the saved files should be closed, including the newly created file f1.txt.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Go to the file menu and select Close All Saved.
4. Verify that all the saved files, including f1.txt, are closed.
